item.title: 一位 86 岁的投资者就价值型股票的背叛向同行发出警告
item.description: 吉姆-卡伦（Jim Cullen）深知这种冲动。陷入困境的廉价股票经理们感觉到自己的职业生涯受到了重创，于是不顾自己的职责，抓起几家价格昂贵的公司，追赶以技术为主导的涨势。【原文：Jim Cullen knows the urge. Embattled cheap-stock managers sense their careers are under siege, ignore their mandate — and grab a few expensive companies to catch up with a rollicking technology-led rally.】

item.title: 美联航与马斯克的 Starlink 达成协议，将提供免费 Wi-Fi 服务
item.description: 美国联合航空公司控股公司（United Airlines Holdings Inc.【原文：United Airlines Holdings Inc. announced a deal for SpaceX’s Starlink to power its inflight Wi-Fi, becoming the first major US carrier to use the satellite system and giving the Elon Musk-run company a marquee customer.】

item.title: 拉丁美洲正在改写规则，令投资者心惊肉跳
item.description: 最近的一系列司法和经济规则变化提醒人们，在拉丁美洲开展业务是多么难以预测，这削弱了该地区对外国投资者的吸引力，这些投资者在多年的低回报率之后已经感到厌倦。【原文：A recent flurry of judicial and economic rule changes has served as a reminder of just how unpredictable operating in Latin America can be, denting the region’s appeal for foreign investors already weary after years of sub-par returns.】

item.title: 中国锂矿停产不足以缓解供应过剩问题
item.description:
在电动汽车退潮的背景下，CATL停牌后生产商股票的上涨很可能是短暂的。【原文：

The bump in producer stocks following CATL’s halt will likely be short-lived amid a retreat on electric vehicles.

】

item.title: 信心持续疲软，中国 8 月信贷增长放缓
item.description: 由于经济前景黯淡，消费者和企业情绪低迷，中国 8 月份的信贷扩张较一年前略有放缓。【原文：China’s credit expansion cooled slightly in August from a year ago, as the economy’s gloomy outlook keeps consumer and business sentiment subdued.】

item.title: 单只股票 ETF 热潮加剧，18 家公司押注海外公司
item.description: 单只股票 ETF 的狂热正在走向全球，有新的公司希望推出产品，让美国交易者有机会直接押注海外公司，而不必担心货币风险。【原文：The single-stock ETF frenzy is going global, with a new bid to launch products that give US traders a way to bet directly on overseas companies — without fretting about currency risk.】

item.title: 诺和诺德将丹麦第二大公司的宝座拱手让给 DSV
item.description: 丹麦的经济已经与诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）交织在一起，诺和诺德公司以其快速畅销的减肥疗法而闻名于世，但这家制药巨头在北欧国家最大公司的排名中却有所下降。【原文：Denmark’s economy has become intertwined with Novo Nordisk A/S, famous for its fast-selling weight-loss treatments, but the pharma giant just got a bump down on the list of the Nordic country’s biggest companies.】

item.title: 债券投资者押注联合信贷银行成功收购德国商业银行
item.description: 债券投资者开始打赌，意大利贷款机构意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）很可能会接管其德国同行德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）。【原文：Bond investors are starting to bet that Italian lender UniCredit SpA will probably take over its German peer Commerzbank AG.】

item.title: 据说汇丰正在商谈将南非业务出售给 FirstRand
item.description: 据知情人士透露，汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）正在洽谈将其南非企业银行业务部门出售给 FirstRand Ltd. 旗下的兰德商业银行（Rand Merchant Bank），因为这家英国贷款机构正在出售非核心资产。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc is in talks to sell its South African corporate banking unit to FirstRand Ltd.’s Rand Merchant Bank, people with knowledge of the matter said, as the the UK lender sells non-core assets.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行投资者支持 Orcel 收购德国商业银行
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）的一些主要投资者支持全面收购德国竞争对手德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG），认为此举将为股东带来更多价值。【原文：Some of UniCredit SpA’s main investors support a full takeover of German rival Commerzbank AG, saying such a move would add value for shareholders.】

item.title: 美国机构敲定拜登五月宣布的对华关税措施
item.description: 美国贸易代表办公室周五正式批准对数十亿美元的中国商品加征关税，为两周后生效铺平了道路。【原文：The office of the US Trade Representative Friday formally approved tariff increases on billions of dollars in Chinese goods, paving the way for them to go into effect in two weeks.】

item.title: 印度市场监管机构主席驳回不当指控
item.description: 印度市场监管机构主席 Madhabi Puri Buch 及其丈夫周五称，最近针对他们的不当指控是 "虚假、恶意和有动机的"。【原文：The chair of India’s market regulator Madhabi Puri Buch and her husband on Friday termed recent allegations of impropriety against them as “false, malicious and motivated.”】

item.title: 英特尔需要重新思考领导力在新芯片世界中的意义
item.description: 如果英特尔希望在当今的芯片行业中茁壮成长，它可能需要调整自己对领导力的定义。但首先...【原文：Intel may need to adjust its definition of leadership if it expects to thrive in today’s chip industry. But first...】

item.title: 对冲基金 Arb 交易冲过 1400 亿美元债务到期潮
item.description: 在债券市场的一个小角落里，将近 1400 亿美元的到期债务浪潮正蓄势待发，这已经是华尔街最热门的对冲基金交易之一。【原文：In a niche corner of the bond market, an almost $140 billion wave of maturing debt is poised to lend momentum to what is already one of Wall Street’s hottest hedge fund trades.】

item.title: 经济学家称美联储今年将削减三个四分之一百分点的货币政策
item.description: 据彭博新闻社调查的经济学家称，美联储很可能在下周及之后的两次会议上将利率下调四分之一个百分点。【原文：The Federal Reserve is likely to lower interest rates by a quarter-point next week and at each of the two meetings that follow, according to economists surveyed by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: Grifols 寻求顾问帮助处理与小股东的关系
item.description: 西班牙制药商 Grifols SA 是今年早些时候做空者攻击的目标，该公司正寻求聘请一家外部咨询公司，在面临收购时帮助处理与少数投资者的关系。【原文：Spanish drugmaker Grifols SA, the target of a short-seller attack earlier in the year, is seeking to hire an external consultancy firm to help deal with minority investors as it faces a takeover approach.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。关于美联储减息规模的辩论再起，黄金和日元反弹，波音工人罢工。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. Debate resumes on the size of the Fed cut, gold and the yen bounce and Boeing workers are on strike. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 新加坡因低价拒绝新商业区竞标
item.description: 新加坡拒绝了一家顶级房地产公司提出的在该岛西部开发一个新商业区的投标，因为他们认为该公司提出的价格不具吸引力。【原文：Singapore rejected a bid by a group of top property firms to develop a new business district in the island’s west, after judging the price offered by it to be unattractive.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡经济在总统选举前增长 4.7
item.description: 斯里兰卡第二季度的经济增长速度超过预期，在该国从数十年来最严重的危机中恢复过来的关键性选举之前提振了人们的情绪。【原文：Sri Lanka’s economy grew faster than expected in the second quarter, bolstering sentiment ahead of a crucial election that could affect policy as the country recovers from its worst crisis in decades.】

item.title: 奈拉跌至新低，当地美元流动性减少
item.description: 尼日利亚货币经历了动荡的一周，在国内外汇市场的美元流动性缩水近一半后，周四跌至历史新低。【原文：Nigeria’s currency, which has endured a volatile week, fell to a record low on Thursday after dollar liquidity in the domestic foreign-exchange market shrank by nearly half.】

item.title: 阿斯利康股价将创 14 个月来最差一周，卖出呼声高涨
item.description: 阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）股价有望创下自2023年7月以来的最大单周跌幅，此前这家英国制药商与合作伙伴第一三共公司（Daiichi Sankyo Co.【原文：AstraZeneca Plc shares are on track for their biggest weekly decline since July 2023, after a disappointing update for the British drugmaker’s experimental lung cancer medicine with partner Daiichi Sankyo Co. prompted two analyst downgrades.】

item.title: 亚洲交易商 Foreland 与经纪商 IG Asia 就伦敦镍交易被否决一事发生争执
item.description: 一位亚洲交易商 Foreland 正在与 IG 集团控股公司（IG Group Holdings Plc）争论，要求返还 2022 年镍空头挤压所产生的利润，声称尽管伦敦金属交易所取消了相关交易，但在线经纪商本应支付看涨押注。【原文：An Asian-based trader Foreland is tussling with IG Group Holdings Plc to return profits arising from the short squeeze in nickel in 2022, claiming that the online broker should have paid out on bullish bets despite the cancellation of underlying trades on the London Metal Exchange.】

item.title: 市场宠儿西班牙有机会获得穆迪评级上调
item.description: 如果穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）在周五晚些时候上调西班牙的信用评级，西班牙将再次获得提振，成为今年最受欢迎的债券市场交易之一。【原文：Already one of the year’s most popular bond-market trades, Spain could get another boost if Moody’s Ratings upgrades its credit score later Friday.】

item.title: 俄罗斯最后一个欧盟天然气消费大国关闭水龙头
item.description: 世界上最宜居的城市维也纳的顶级公用事业公司终于改掉了使用俄罗斯天然气的习惯。【原文：The top utility in Vienna — the world’s most-livable city — finally kicked its Russian natural gas habit.】

item.title: 在刚果传播的 Mpox 变异病毒影响到邻国乌干达的 10 人
item.description: 在东非国家首次发现该疾病数周后，在刚果民主共和国传播的毒性麻风腮病毒株在邻国乌干达造成了 10 例感染。【原文：The virulent mpox strain spreading in the Democratic Republic of Congo is responsible for 10 infections in neighboring Uganda, weeks after the disease was first detected in the East African country.】

item.title: 联合国未能打破银行僵局，利比亚石油流量进一步下滑
item.description: 利比亚的原油出口继续下滑，原因是联合国领导的会谈未能打破该国中央银行控制权的僵局，而这一僵局已蔓延到该国的石油工业。【原文：Libya’s crude exports continued to slump as UN-led talks failed to break an impasse over control of the country’s central bank that has spilled over into its oil industry.】

item.title: 英国家庭自 2008 年以来首次预期降息
item.description: 英国央行的一项调查显示，英国人预计利率将在近 16 年来首次下降，这表明家庭正变得越来越乐观。【原文：Britons expect interest rates to fall for the first time in almost 16 years, according to a Bank of England survey, in a sign that households are growing more optimistic.】

item.title: 莫迪在克什米尔的昔日盟友希望阻止印度人民党控制克什米尔
item.description: 查谟和克什米尔地区局势动荡，总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）的一位前盟友现在愿意与对手合作，以阻止其政党在下周开始的选举后组建地方政府。【原文：A former ally of Prime Minister Narendra Modi in the volatile region of Jammu and Kashmir is now open to working with rivals to block his party from forming a local government after elections that kick off next week.】

item.title: 福特将在 2021 年退出后利用印度工厂进行出口
item.description: 福特汽车公司计划在印度南部的工厂生产汽车并出口到全球，而在此之前三年，该汽车制造商曾表示将关闭其在印度的工厂。【原文：Ford Motor Co. plans to manufacture cars at its plant in southern India for exporting globally, three years after the carmaker said it will shut its factories in India.】
